function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Collection of personal health data for public health analysis and monitoring","Impact":"Privacy and security risks for individuals","Mitigation":"Implement strong data anonymization and encryption protocols","Technologies":"Data anonymization and encryption tools","People":"General public","Owner":"Public health organizations and technology companies"},{"Description":"Prediction and tracking of virus spread based on location data","Impact":"Risk of location data misuse and surveillance","Mitigation":"Ensure strict data protection measures and user consent for data collection","Technologies":"Privacy-preserving location tracking algorithms","People":"General public","Owner":"Technology companies and public health organizations"},{"Description":"Use of AI to assess and predict disease transmission","Impact":"Potential biases and inaccuracies in AI predictions","Mitigation":"Regular auditing and validation of AI algorithms, diversity in training data","Technologies":"AI auditing tools, diverse training data sets","People":"Public health officials and general public","Owner":"Technology companies and AI developers"}]}
